code:
export const requerido = value => value || typeof value === 'number' ? undefined : 'Required';
export const email = value => value && !/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(value) ? 'Invalid email address' : undefined;

sourcesContent:
export const requerido = value => (value || typeof value === 'number' ? undefined : 'Required');

export const email = value => value && !/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(value)? 'Invalid email address' : undefined;
